entry.title: New release for UpSnap: 4.2.4
entry.content:
Changelog

Bug fixes

  • 62f849cbef4603206573d88e9082748f6aea25a8: fix: unable to delete user #411 (@seriousm4x)

entry.title: New release for UpSnap: 4.2.5
entry.content:
Changelog

Features

  • 7fe56a80b0527ba0b33942a12b69b5b707872e44: feat: add spanish (@Raulmora22)

Bug fixes

  • 9f0657a16a075eb56bf13fd9da037fc3eaca7378: fix: import es from date-fns (@seriousm4x)

Others

  • 3d304bea135522362ab25dcaa3190b2729fe3c40: Update index.ts (@Raulmora22)
  • a739adb3a485665a813a2887636580d9cc0ea93c: Update index.ts (@Raulmora22)
  • a6c8a7bbfa44c7c402f525f8c9c33fcb38c56d2d: i translate all UpSnap in spanish (@Raulmora22)
  • e62e67827c2d1b0d3d7d643ffc1d91f5d4484896: update deps (@seriousm4x)

Go dependencies

  • c5995c69c573f599a509e77060e4896106b0dfd6: go-dep: bump github.com/pocketbase/pocketbase in /backend (@dependabot[bot])

Npm dependencies

  • d474af0303850e5a50414167a06e8be94fc41f39: npm-dep: bump husky from 8.0.3 to 9.0.1 in /frontend (@dependabot[bot])
  • 82c7cbfa1ea016c4b29278e1640195ed4b7bd343: npm-dep: bump husky from 9.0.1 to 9.0.6 in /frontend (@dependabot[bot])
  • ede3c4ff5110f0fdfd2f7f50f2ff686737d112e4: npm-dep: bump pocketbase from 0.20.3 to 0.21.0 in /frontend (@dependabot[bot])

entry.title: New release for UpSnap: 4.2.6
entry.content:
Changelog

Features

  • a907dd94696409a64a86fb0ef7b69b3e6886a1ff: feat: allow all auth providers enabled in the backend (@seriousm4x)
